title: Global leading fishing nations 2017
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Capture in million metric tons in each Country on the y axis.
The Capture in million metric tons is appeared to be the highest at Country China and lowest at Country Myanmar.
The difference of Capture in million metric tons between the highest and lowest Country is 13.22.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Capture in million metric tons in the y axis.
The Capture in million metric tons is appeared to be the highest at Country China and lowest at Country Myanmar.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Capture in million metric tons in each Country on the y axis.
The Capture in million metric tons is appeared to be the highest at Country China and lowest at Country Myanmar.
The difference of Capture in million metric tons between the highest and lowest Country is 13.22.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Capture in million metric tons for 10 number of Countrys.
The Capture in million metric tons is appeared to be the highest at Country China and lowest at Country Myanmar.
Second maximum Capture in million metric tons is found at Country Indonesia.
There is a difference of 13.22 between the maximum Country China and minimum Country Myanmar.
Country China is higher than any other Countrys with value 15.37, followed by Indonesia, and India. Down to Country Myanmar with the lowest value 2.15.
The Country China tends to be 2.92 percent higher than average.
The Capture in million metric tons is 52.56 if we add up values of all Countrys.
